message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to counter with an offer of $90.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $95.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $92.
I'm not quite ready to give up on this deal, Bob! I'm willing to make another offer. I'll sell the product to you for $98.
Thank you for your continued offer, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $96.
I'm not willing to go any higher than $98, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $97.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $95.
I'm getting close to walking away from this deal, Bob. I'll make one more offer. I'll sell the product to you for $99.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $97.
